snippet.title: Get To The Orange Door (GTTOD) - Steam Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
The objective is in the title: Get To The Orange Door.

Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/541200/Get_To_The_Orange_Door/

An adrenaline-pumping roguelite first-person-shooter, GTTOD is inspired by the punch-drunk fluidity of modern shooters such as Titanfall 2 and the Halo franchise, as well as frenetic classics like the original DOOM.

Early Access includes access to several modes: Overhaul, D-Mod, Quick Play, and Training Mode.
• Overhaul – get your first glimpse at the main campaign in GTTOD. 
• D-Mod – build and share your custom-designed levels with the entire community.
• Quick Play – experience intense parkour in endless randomly generated levels.
• Training Mode – drop into a playground and hone your skills.

Cast in a vivid neon-and-chrome retrofuturist aesthetic, GTTOD offers endless replay and tons to discover. Join the 15k+ member community and experience a parkour-driven FPS unlike any other. Striking visuals, loads of weapons, and more enemies than you have bullets for will keep you running, sliding, and dashing your way from level to level.

Join the Community today, chat with the dev, and be the first to hear about all-new updates, content, and plans.
Discord: https://discord.gg/GTTOD
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArcadeCoinGames
Web: https://GTTOD.com

#earlyaccess #fps #steam
